tha-ap18:12.2: vissakammena māpito → vissakammena nimmito (bj) | visukammena māpito (s2, s3, mr)
tha-ap18:13.1: Dasasaddāvivittaṃ taṃ → dasa saddā avivittaṃ (bj, pts1)
tha-ap18:17.1: Sacevaseyya agāraṃ → sace vaseyyāgāraṃ (bj) | sace vaseyya āgāraṃ (pts1) | sacā'vaseyya (?)
tha-ap18:19.4: evaṃ rakkhiṃ mahāmuni → evaṃ rakkhiṃ mahāmune (bj) | mamaṃ dakkhi mahāmuni (s2, s3) | mamaṃ rakkhi mahāmuni (pts1, c1) 19Th1.A:7 (22 piṭṭhe)
